resources.string:
App does not support x32 processor architecture, only x64! 

 Please, read PocketMine-MP requirements about x32 support: https://pmmp.readthedocs.io/en/rtfd/installation/requirements.html 

 This is not our decision, but the PMMP team, please treat with understanding and not lower the grade, we can’t do anything with it
To make the application work correctly, you need grant access to the memory of your device!
Failed to get assemblies of PocketMine-MP
It is development build and it may have bugs, crash, corrupt your data, or break your plugins
Server disabled. Start before to enter command!

Always download the latest core versions from the PMMP command. Not satisfied? Put the file PocketMine-MP.phar in the appropriate folder on the memory card and use the kernel of third-party developers!
Free online service for pack and unpack phar archives: Phar Converter
This project is based on ScerIO PocketMine-MP Android: PocketMine-MP Android
Run PocketMine-MP server both on your Android device! Check the self-made plugins. Play with your friends in the vicinity. Do not limit yourself to anything and let your imagination run wild.
